text: Bertram McDougall (17 January 1890 – 10 January 1951) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Bertie McDougall's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1890 births Category:1951 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Bertie McDougall
